value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.05250v1", "title": "Non-vanishing implies numerical dimension one abundance", "summary": "We show that the non-vanishing conjecture implies the abundance conjecture\nwhen $\\nu\\leq 1$. We also prove the abundance conjecture in dimension $\\leq 5$\nwhen $\\kappa\\geq 0$ and $\\nu\\leq 1$ unconditionally.", "main_category": "math.AG", "categories": "math.AG,math.CV,math.DG", "published": "2025-05-08T13:54:51Z"}
